features: Based on actual HTML structures from uploaded website examples
Enhanced safety features with dry run and preview modes
Real venue addresses and enhanced keyword detection
Support for all major bear event websites

safety.dryRun: When true, no calendar changes will be made
safety.preview: Shows detailed preview of what operations would be performed
safety.calendarSync: Must be explicitly enabled to allow calendar modifications
safety.safetyMode: Enables all safety features and protections

notes.usage: Copy this file to 'bear-event-parser-input.json' and modify as needed
